name: Export Comment Authors
author: Brian J. Link

sections.description: Export Comment Authors lets you extract the Names, Email Addresses and more of your Comment Authors into a CSV file. This plugin is a great way to jump start a newsletter by importing the resulting CSV file into any of the popular newsletter services like MailChimp, AWeber or Campaign Monitor. It can also be used to extract information on a per post basis for things like contests.
sections.installation:
1. Upload export-comment-authors to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Export Comment Authors can be accessed under the “Comments” Menu of the WordPress Admin.
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • Added “IP Address” Column to show the last IP Address the author had.
  • Shameless Plugs

1.2

  • Added “Date” Column to show the date of the last comment the author made.

1.1

  • Added “Export Authors” button to Admin’s Comments Page.
  • Minor syntax changes for older installations of PHP.

1.0

  • Initial version.
